title: Modern Wales
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures, James Carr and Peter Hopkinson
brief_description: The fluctuating world demand for the wealth which lay beneath the lovely valleys of Wales - her iron, steel and coal - brought severe economic depression. As a consequence, Welsh industry was re-orientated so that it would never again rely on a few basic products.
